mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_id AS "channelId.id", a.category_id AS "categoryId.id", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zms_channel_category a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.channel_id LIKE '%'||#{channelId.id}||'%' '%'+#{channelId.id}+'%' concat('%',#{channelId.id},'%')
AND a.category_id LIKE '%'||#{categoryId.id}||'%' '%'+#{categoryId.id}+'%' concat('%',#{categoryId.id},'%')
AND a.status LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%' '%'+#{status}+'%' concat('%',#{status},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zms_channel_category( id, channel_id, category_id, status, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, remark1 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{channelId.id}, #{categoryId.id}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{remark1} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zms_channel_category SET channel_id = #{channelId.id}, category_id = #{categoryId.id}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM zms_channel_category WHERE channel_id = #{channelId.id} AND category_id = #{categoryId.id}
